scripts.start: yarn clean:dist; yarn clean:package-modules; parcel example/index.html --no-cache
scripts.build: yarn build:packages; yarn clean:dist; yarn clean:package-modules; parcel build example/index.html --no-cache
scripts.clean: yarn clean:dist; yarn clean:packages; yarn clean:modules; yarn clean:package-modules
scripts.clean:modules: rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock package-lock.json lerna-debug.log yarn-error.log
scripts.clean:packages: lerna exec -- rm -rf dist yarn.lock yarn-error.log package-lock.json
scripts.clean:package-modules: lerna exec -- rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock yarn-error.log package-lock.json
scripts.postinstall: npx lerna link --force-local && npx lerna run build && npx lerna run copy:package:cjs
scripts.link:all: npx lerna exec -- yarn unlink; npx lerna exec -- yarn link
scripts.link:all-force: npx lerna exec -- yarn unlink; yarn link:all
